Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
appointments.Appointment
public class Appointment extends Object
Represents an appointment in the system, including details about the doctor, patient, date, time, status, and an optional outcome record.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Appointment(String appointmentId, String doctorId, String patientId, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime, String status)
    Constructs an Appointment object with the specified details.

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(String appointmentId, String doctorId, String patientId, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime, String status)
      Constructs an Appointment object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the unique ID of the appointment
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor assigned to the appointment
      patientId - the ID of the patient linked to the appointment
      appointmentDate - the date of the appointment
      appointmentTime - the time of the appointment
      status - the status of the appointment

    • fromCSV

      public static Appointment fromCSV(String csvString)
      Creates an Appointment object from a CSV-formatted string. This method is intended to be overridden by subclasses.
      Parameters:
      csvString - the CSV-formatted string representing an appointment
      Returns:
      the Appointment object
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if the method is not overridden
